login_by_send_code: Enter your email to receive a confirmation code
send_magic_link: A confirmation code has been sent to <address>{email}</address>. Enter the code below and click Submit to log in.
select_inforamiton: Please select your country and channel afrom the options below.
attempts_deduction: 1 heart deducted for each incorrect answer.
time_limit_per_quiz: Each quiz has a 30 sec time limit. Each stage has a limit of 5 incorrect quiz attempts.
you_have_5_attemps: If you reach the 5 incorrect quiz limit, you must restart at the first question of that stage.
giveup_or_interrupt_quiz: If you quit a stage or it is interrupted, you must restart at the first question of that stage.
answer_first_attempt: Total points awarded will vary based on: answering correctly on the first attempt; giving consecutive correct answers; stage completion; number of remaining attempts.
congratulation 1: Congratulations! You have earned the Galaxy AI Expert(S25) Badge
congratulation 2: Congratulations! You have earned the Galaxy AI Expert(S25) Adbanved Badge
rank_notification: You are ranked in the top XX %
badge_deliver: Your badge is being issued. Please allow up to 5 minutes for it to appear.
badgedeliver2: your badge is being issued. To check your issued badge, please check your mail
base_score_description: Each correct answer is worth 20 points
combo_score_description: Each consecutive correct answer earns you an additional 2 points
remaiing_attempts_description: Upon completion of the stage, you will receive 10 points for each remaining attempt.
alert_notification: No attempts remaining. Do you want to retry? Selecting “No” will return you to stage selection.
network_error: The network is unstable. Please try again later.
code_error: The verification code is invalid. Please check again.
email_error: We are unable to complete your login. Please check the email address.
email_failed: Failed to send email. Please try again.
email_title: Authentication Code for Galaxy AI Expert.
email_verify_code_description_1: Please enter this code on the verification page to complete the process.
email_verify_code_description_2: For your security, this code will expire in 10 minutes.
email_badge_description_2: You have earned the Galaxy AI Expert Badge.
email_badge_description_3: You have earned the Galaxy AI Expert Advanced Badge.
email_badge_description_4: This message was automatically delivered by Samsung+ service. Do not reply to this message.
